activities: We collect First name, Middle Name, Last Name, address, phone, date of birth, gender, height and weight, ethnicity, occupation, case number and violation. We collect only on behalf of our customers which are typically governmental agencies as they monitor offenders.  We only use data for verification that an offender has violate home arrest or use height, weight and occupation to access the Transdermal Alcohol Content of the offender.   We only collect data for the alcohol or home arrest individual through the agencies, we do not collect any data on our own.
personaldata: There is no manually processed data.   All data is collected on the Internet online.
recoursemech: We use TRUSTe as our independent recourse mechanism to  investigate unresolved complaints.
